version_description:
**IOS 8 Users: V1.2 is coming in a matter of days**

Features:
- You can now start and stop generators from the lock screen or using your remote controls.
- Added feedback when fetching a Noise Generator demo from the More Noises screen.
- Animate speeds are now even truer to their name; just try Wobbler...
- You can delete / re-download all your generators from the More Noise screen.
- Downloading several generators is much faster.
- Randomized noises are now much less louder.

Boring bugfixes:
- Fixed a store issue with the All You Can Hear package.
- Fixed an issue where some localized prices would be truncated.
- Fixed labels being truncated. To be fair these were boring labels: warnings about missing headphones and Network being unreachable.
- Builtin presets could be duplicated under some conditions. We're not saying which ones.
- Timers now work for non-GMT timezones. We asked HRH and she gave her blessing.
Fixes issues with White Noise and Binaural Generators.

- Super Generators, layer up to five of your favourite soundscapes and create your own mix!
- Battery use improvement and a ton of bug fixes
- Two additional free generators: Spring Walk & Temple Bells
- Easier search for soundscapes using categories and keywords

- Organise Favourites!
- Save Multi-Gens!
- Fade-out is back!
- Stability and Battery usage improvements! (jargon for: I fixed some glaring mistakes)

Huge thanks to all our supporters for this v2, and keep on sending feedback to app@mynoise.net! Your feedback made this release possible!

- Saving Multi-Gens
- Layout issues
- Fixed stability issues
- Fix incompatibilities with iOS 9.3

New:
- "Toddler Mode" added to the Downloads page.

Fixed:
- Favourites layout issues
- iOS9 display issues

Improved the ambient sound generator with more features, expect your noises to sound even better in the coming weeks!
Shake to random is now an option.

More free generators!
+ Unreal Ocean: calming ocean waves
+ Tibetan Choir: overtone singing monks

Less free bugs!
- Downloads screen flickering is gone
- Now playing icon in iOS11 Control Centre aspect ratio fix

More design tweaks:
- Faster loading
- Removed old global volume + airplay controls: Control Centre does the same thing much better now!

We have gone code-whisperer on the app and:
- Downloads should behave now.
- The favourites layout has been given a stern talking to.
- Multigens are a bit more Voice Over-friendly but their report cards are not looking as good as we hoped, so things are going to change soon on that front soon, or so help me!

New year, new toys, joy, joy, joy!
- New devices: iPad and iPhone X
- New features: Landscape mode and iPad Multitasking
- New shiny: iOS 10 integration

We are very happy to bring you an updated myNoise to start the year with a bang!
Expect another batch of updates for more iPad love and getting us closer to 100% VoiceOver coverage.

Best wishes for 2018!
The myNoise Team

More free generators!
+ Unreal Ocean: calming ocean waves
+ Tibetan Choir: overtone singing monks

Less free bugs!
- Downloads screen flickering is gone
- Now playing icon in iOS11 Control Centre aspect ratio fix

More design tweaks:
- Faster loading
- Removed old global volume + airplay controls: Control Centre does the same thing much better now!

We've got a new VoiceOver-friendly design for the Multi-Generators!

Bug Fixes:
- Multigen favourites do not save custom presets
- Favourites screen layout is broken on some devices.

New features:
- You can now share your presets with other myNoise users!
- Your favorites are now accessible by using 3D-touch on the app Icon.

We would love to have a catchy codename for this release, like "myNoise Excess to the MAX!!!" to celebrate the new iPhones, but instead we're releasing 2.6.1 with the following bugfix:
- Saving mutigens now works even with custom presets.

Thanks to all the reporters and beta testers for spotting this one.
Sharing and synchronisation of favourites through iCloud.

Bugfixes... sorry!
- Fix crashes when previewing new generators
- Fix Multigens saving with the wrong name
- Fix crashes when importing

New features:
- You can now share your presets with other myNoise users!
- Your favorites are now accessible by using 3D-touch on the app Icon.

Fixed cosmetic issues with Dark Mode.
Removed the Toddler Lock from the Downloads page.

- Fixed cosmetic issues with Dark Mode.
- Removed the Toddler Lock feature from the Downloads page.
- Removed the Crash On Startup feature. Apparently some of you want to use the app?

- Add ability to change all sliders at the same time
- Improved readability using Dark / Light mode in conjunction with the Reduced Transparency accessibility feature.
- Open issue: can't think of any joke for this What's New section.

We are keeping busy during this lockdown, tidying-up some loose ends:
- Fine-tune the 'global increase / decrease' buttons behaviour
- Fix crashes when opening the app from a shared preset
- Fix iPad crashes when sharing a generator
- Binge-watching Community

iOS 14.2 support:
- The new myNoise Favourites Widget can display up to 5 favourites in the main device interface. 
- Fixed a bug preventing from sorting favourites.
Fix a crash when scrolling in iOS 14
- Fix Timer UI
